mapper.select: SELECT item_key_id as itemKeyId, item_key as itemKey, type, status FROM bison.item_key
SELECT item_key_id as itemKeyId, item_key as itemKey, business_unit_id as businessUnitId, type, status, last_day_val as lastDayVal FROM bison.item_key WHERE business_unit_id = #{businessUnitId}

SELECT ik.item_key_id as itemKeyId, ik.item_key as itemKey, ik.type, ik.`status` FROM bison.item_key ik, bison.user u where ik.business_unit_id = u.business_unit_id and ik.type = #{type} and u.user_id = #{userId} and ik.status = #{status}
